Title: The Prisoner
Plot: Riario engages the Pope and a mysterious prisoner in a discussion concerning the count's defeat, while Leonardo searches for a rational explanation when an outbreak of demonic possession occurs at a convent, and the blame is placed on the Medicis.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Writer: Scott M. Gimple, David S. Goyer
GuestStars: Estella Daniels, Paul Westwood, Ian Pirie, Sean Jackson, David Sterne, Simon Armstrong, Roger Evans, Sarah Ball, Laura Rees, Tim Faraday, Jenny Rainsford, Jason Langley, Sharon Morgan, Andrew Brooke, Erik Madsen, Ma
